footer.tagline: A circular community of women focused on wellbeing, sustainability, art and collaboration. Every exchange is a seed that blooms in community.

hero.subtitle: Join a community where you can exchange services, time, objects and ideas with real women like you.
hero.tagline: üîÑ Exchange services  ü§ù Connect with real women üíõ Grow your purpose

howItWorks.label: How Beginss works
howItWorks.title:
Sign up, explore
and live the community from the app
howItWorks.description: Beginss is a circular platform: you sign up, choose how to participate and follow everything from the app. That simple to start connecting with other women.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Sign up, set your interests and start creating valuable connections.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Barter, services, time, proposals‚Ä¶ participate wherever you want.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Follow your activities, chat and make an impact from the Beginss app.

whatYouCanDo.title: What you can do in Beginss
whatYouCanDo.description: In Beginss you can exchange, collaborate and find real support with other women. The platform is organized in simple spaces so you know exactly where to start.
whatYouCanDo.marketplaceDesc: Publish products, services or workshops. Sell for money, barter or use time points with other community members.
whatYouCanDo.connectionsTitle: Save members and connect from your profile
whatYouCanDo.connectionsDesc: Add to your connections list the women you want to stay in touch with. Access your saved contacts from your profile and connect whenever you want.
whatYouCanDo.collaborationDesc: Create or join initiatives, alliances and projects where other women seek to co-create and collaborate.
whatYouCanDo.barterTitle: Give new life to what you no longer use
whatYouCanDo.barterDesc: Exchange clothes, books, objects and resources with other Beginss women so they keep circulating.

communityHow.label: How it works
communityHow.title: Our Community
communityHow.description: Discover how to connect, share and transform with other Beginss women.
communityHow.step1Desc: Based on your interests, profession and needs. Connect with like-minded women.
communityHow.step2Desc: Meet women, share interests and build mutual support networks.
communityHow.step3Desc: Barter products or services with no hassle.
communityHow.step4Desc: Products, services, activities or courses you offer.
communityHow.step5Desc: With people of similar interests, locally or globally.
communityHow.step6Desc: Chats or talks on topics of interest with the community.

values.label: What drives us
values.title: Active Values
values.description: Values that guide every action, every exchange and every connection in Beginss

bienestar.name: Wellbeing
bienestar.description: We care for our personal and collective balance to grow in harmony.

empoderamiento.name: Empowerment
empoderamiento.description: We believe in every woman's strength to lead her own path.

generosidad.name: Generosity
generosidad.description: We share what we know and have, multiplying opportunities.

innovacion.name: Innovation
innovacion.description: We turn ideas into real solutions that create impact.

naturaleza.name: Nature
naturaleza.description: We live in connection and respect with the environment that sustains us.

sostenibilidad.name: Sustainability
sostenibilidad.description: We build today with tomorrow's wellbeing in mind.

sororidad.name: Sisterhood
sororidad.description: We support, listen to and grow with each other.

circularidad.name: Circularity
circularidad.description: What we give returns transformed, strengthening our bonds.

womenBeginss.label: Value proposition
womenBeginss.title: Beginss Women
womenBeginss.para1: In our value proposition we offer a living circle, where you will find solutions to your needs through collaboration and the exchange of knowledge.
womenBeginss.para2: More than expanding your network, you will create real bonds with Beginss Women who share your values and are ready to support you, while you support others.

circles.label: Action circles
circles.title:
Discover your Action
Circle
circles.description: Six paths to inspire you, grow and transform your life with other women. From the collaborative economy to art with purpose, holistic wellbeing, sustainability and conscious consumption.
circles.description2: Each circle is an opportunity to act, learn and weave networks that drive a fairer and more supportive future.
circles.joinToday: Join today and be part of the change
circles.worldWeWant: The world we want to see

economia.title:
Economy and collaborative
work
economia.description: Women who create, exchange and thrive together.

arte.title: Art with meaning
arte.description: We express and transform the world through our creativity.

armonia.title: Emotional harmony
armonia.description: We nurture our inner strength and share it with others.

sostenibilidadAccion.title:
Sustainability
in action
sostenibilidadAccion.description: We lead habits and projects that leave a positive footprint.

medioAmbiente.title: Environment
medioAmbiente.description: We protect the earth as a source of life and future.

consumo.title: Conscious consumption
consumo.description: We choose products that reflect our values and care for the planet.

explore.label: Explore Beginss
explore.title: Spaces to grow
explore.description: Spaces designed for you to share, learn and grow in community
explore.marketplaceDesc: Every purchase is support, every sale an opportunity.
explore.cafecitoDesc: Conversations that inspire and connect hearts.
explore.circulosDesc: Thematic spaces to go deeper and build.

cta.title:
Ready to start
your transformation?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of women who are already creating their future in Beginss

login.subtitle: Take your talent further, publish your events, workshops or talks and connect with Beginss Women who want to learn from you.
login.inspire: Inspire, share and fill your spots!

register.inspire: Inspire, share and fill your spots!

hero.title: Cafecito Zone
hero.subtitle: From one Beginss Woman to another: pause, connection and creation. A digital space where we slow down to raise inspiration.
hero.subtitleBold: Everything designed to inspire you, support you and weave together a network that drives dreams and creates real impact.

sectionConnect.title: A space to connect and enjoy together!
sectionConnect.description: Find new friends, share experiences, make plans or simply have a conversation.

ctaShare.subtitle: Every experience inspires, every conversation connects. Join thousands of women who share and grow together.

card1.title: Cafecito: Women's Entrepreneurship
card1.description: Let's talk about the challenges and joys of being a woman entrepreneur. Share your experience and learn from others.

card2.title: Cafecito in the Park
card2.description: In-person gathering to meet and share a coffee outdoors. Perfect for making new friends.

card3.title: Cafecito: Wellbeing and Self-care
card3.description: Let's talk about self-care practices and mental wellbeing. A safe space to share and learn.

card4.title: Literary Cafecito
card4.description: Share your favorite reads and recommendations. For book lovers and great stories.

card5.title: Cafecito: Creativity and Art
card5.description: A space to explore our creativity together. Share your artistic projects and find inspiration.

card6.title: Beginss Brunch
card6.description: Special brunch gathering to connect, chat and enjoy. Bring your favorite dish to share.

hero.description2: Each circle is an opportunity to act, learn and weave networks that drive a fairer and more supportive future.

economia.title: Economy and Collaborative Work
economia.description: Entrepreneurship, professional development and support networks to grow economically in a conscious and collaborative way.

armonia.title: Wellbeing and Emotional Harmony
armonia.description: Spaces for self-care, mental health and emotional wellbeing. Meditation, therapy and support among women.

arte.title: Art with Meaning
arte.description: Creativity that inspires and transforms. Workshops, artistic projects and expression through conscious art.

sostenibilidad.title: Sustainability in Action
sostenibilidad.description: Sustainable practices for everyday life. Recycling, zero waste and lifestyles that care for the planet.

medio-ambiente.title: Environment
medio-ambiente.description: Climate action, conservation and environmental projects. Together for a greener, healthier planet.

consumo.title: Conscious Consumption
consumo.description: Conscious purchasing decisions. We support ethical brands, fair trade and the circular economy.

hero.title: Exchange
hero.subtitle1: Here, every exchange is an opportunity and every connection, a boost.
hero.subtitle2: We connect through generosity: we give, we receive and we grow together.

sectionConnect.title: Exchange connections with meaning
sectionConnect.platformDescription: A platform for women to exchange knowledge, products and services, connecting with others in their city or LATAM to create alliances and projects.
